title: Use Clang for Windows (m68)
body:
**Description of Change**

Switch to using Clang 9 instead of MSVC for Win32 builds.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Resolves #758 
- Related to #686 

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

There shouldn't be any visible _changes_ except for performance improvements. Google has been optimizing skia for Clang, and as a result the MSVC binaries are significantly slower. With this PR, we are using Clang on Windows desktop/Win32 so we get all those improvements now.

UWP is still using MSVC, but that will be changed at a later stage.

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [x] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [x] Updated documentation
